subject: Physical Fitness
title: VO2 Max and Longevity
description: A 60-second lesson on VO2 Max and Longevity.

hook.text: VO2 max measures peak oxygen use during exercise. It's the single best predictor of how long you'll live.

buildup.text: Low VO2 max is a stronger predictor of early death than smoking, diabetes, or heart disease alone.

discovery.text: A study of 122,000 people found no upper limit to the survival benefit of higher cardio fitness.

twist.text: VO2 max drops about 10% per decade after age 25. But training can cut that decline in half.

climax.text: An 80-year-old with high VO2 max can match the aerobic capacity of an average 50-year-old.
